cn.warning: 密码需为 8〜16 码英文，数字组合 ( 可含 - or _ )
cn.mustEqual: 这些密码不相符，请再试一次

en.warning: Password must be a combination of 8 to 16 numbers and letters ( - or _ is allow ).
en.leastEight: Password must be at least 8 characters.
en.mostSixteen: Password must be at most 16 characters.
en.mustEqual: Those passwords didn't match, Try again
